items.title: Tal Rasha's Guardianship
items.description: Part of the Tal Rasha's set, this chest piece provides high defense and multiple bonuses when combined with other set pieces.

items.title: Tal Belt 10-14% Magic Find
items.description: This belt from the Tal set is a great asset for magic find character builds.

items.title: Tal Orb 2 Cold
items.description: This orb boosts cold skills and is part of the Tal Rasha's set. Ideal for cold-based sorceress builds.

items.title: Andariel's Visage
items.description: Channel magical energy through this ancient staff.

items.title: Paladin Hellfire Torch (10-13/10-13)
items.description: The Hellfire Torch is a unique Large Charm which is the reward for the completion of the Pandemonium Event. Only one may be in the inventory at a time. This version offers +3 to Palladin's Skill Levels.
